title: 1710动物单车mod玩家无法生成坐骑
author: misaki丶mei

replies.txt_content:
嘿嘿 我找到了

animalbikes..use

 bat, bunny, chicken, chocobo, cow, creeper, dino, enderdragon, enderman, ghast, irongolem, notch, pig, pony, reindeer, sheep, silverfish, snowgolem, spider, squid, wolf, wither


把下面的动物加到上面权限两个点中间给玩家就可以了
我也在找这个问题 只有op能用  不知道怎么办
